title: Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart, Steel Mesh Removable Sides, 3 cu ft, 400 lb Capacity, Green
descriptions:
Hello, we have good cart for garden work. This is Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM. It is strong because made of steel and can carry up to 400 lb. You can put many thing on cart, it has size of 34 inches long and 18 inches wide.

Frame of cart is steel mesh, very durable. You can take off side panels so it is easy to put big things on cart. Also, it can change to flatbed cart if you need. Cart has 4 wheels, they are big, 10-inch and filled with air for move easy on ground. Even if ground is not flat, cart can go because it has good space under it.

It is not hard to put together, it is quick. When you need to pull cart, it has straight handle, good for hands. Turning is not hard, it has tight turn radius so you can go around things in garden.

Cart is green color, nice for outside. It is not heavy, only 36.6 pounds and not tall, 37 inches high. When you buy, it comes with warranty for 1 year.

This Gorilla Cart is good for garden or any outside work where you need to move many things. It is strong and easy to use. Thank you for look at our product.

Hello! We have nice cart for garden work. This cart name is Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart. Cart is very strong because made from steel, and has steel mesh frame. You can put together fast and not hard. Side panels can come off, so you can use like flatbed cart for carry big things easy.

Cart has 4 wheels and they are big, size 10-inch, and filled with air (pneumatic), so move smooth on ground. You can turn tight corners with it and not get stuck because it is high from ground. Cart can carry 400 pounds, so many things you can move. The place where you put things is 34 inches long and 18 inches wide.

Handle is straight and you pull with hand. Cart is green color, look nice in garden. It is not heavy, only 36.6 pounds, and from bottom to top is 37 inches high. You have warranty for 1 year if something is not right.

Thank you for looking at our garden cart. It is good for work in garden or anywhere you need to move many things easy.
